p: There were statistically significant ‘between-sample nature’ (i.e. oil vs. potato chips) differences found for tran,trans-alka-2,4-dienals and n-alkanals ( p = 4.42 × 10 −5 and 5.13 × 10 −3 respectively), but not for trans-2-alkenals. As expected, there were also very highly significant differences observed between consecutive frying episode number for these aldehydes ( p < 10 −6, 1.84 × 10 −5 and 5.13 × 10 −3 for trans-2-alkenals, trans,trans-alka-2,4-dienals and n-alkanals respectively).
